events.title: Communication Delegation
events.description: Assistant U.S. Attorney (MARS) informs defense attorneys that U.S. Attorney Acosta has designated (MARS) to handle all Epstein-related communications.

keyFacts: U.S. Attorney Acosta delegated all communications regarding the Epstein case to Assistant U.S. Attorney (MARS), indicating a controlled communication protocol.
Acosta would not return calls from defense attorneys unless (MARS) advised that neither (MARS) nor the Chief in West Palm Beach could answer the question.
The email suggests a formalized process for handling inquiries related to the Epstein matter, possibly to manage legal strategy or public relations.
